body_html:
@sm-jalali-f Just use TensorFlow, its easy and well documented:

In Python:

    builder = tf.saved_model.builder.SavedModelBuilder(path)
    builder.add_meta_graph_and_variables(sess, [tf.saved_model.tag_constants.SERVING])
    builder.save(False)

In Java:

    SavedModelBundle.load(path, "serve").session();

@soumith @goldsborough
